text: pinnīṭ atin śēṣavuṁ niṅṅaḷuṭe manas'sukaḷ kaṭuttupēāyi. ava pāṟapēāleyēā atinekkāḷ kaṭuttatēā āyi bhaviccu. pāṟakaḷil cilatil ninn nadikaḷ peāṭṭi oḻukāṟuṇṭ‌. cilat piḷarnn veḷḷaṁ puṟatt varunnu. cilat daivabhayattāl tāḻēāṭṭ uruṇṭu vīḻukayuṁ ceyyunnu. niṅṅaḷ pravarttikkunna yāteānninepaṟṟiyuṁ allāhu oṭṭuṁ aśrad'dhanalla
